author: Elastic
attributes.description: Identifies when a single AWS resource is making `DescribeInstances` API calls in more than 10 regions within a 30-second window. This could indicate a potential threat actor attempting to discover the AWS infrastructure across multiple regions using compromised credentials or a compromised instance. Adversaries may use this information to identify potential targets for further exploitation or to gain a better understanding of the target's infrastructure.
attributes.name: AWS EC2 Multi-Region DescribeInstances API Calls
